scripts.start: npm run enable-devtools && npm run watch
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run spicetify-watch" "npm run watch-ext" "npm run watch-theme" "npm run watch-colors"
scripts.build: npm run build-ext && npm run build-theme && npm run build-colors
scripts.build-local: npm run build-ext:local && npm run build-theme:local && npm run build-colors:local
scripts.watch-ext: for /f usebackq %i in (`spicetify path -s folder`) do spicetify-creator --watch --out=%i
scripts.build-ext: for /f usebackq %i in (`spicetify path -s folder`) do spicetify-creator --out=%i
scripts.watch-theme: for /f usebackq %i in (`spicetify path -s css`) do sass --watch theme/app.scss %i --no-source-map
scripts.build-theme: for /f usebackq %i in (`spicetify path -s css`) do sass theme/app.scss %i --no-source-map --no-error-css
scripts.build-colors: for /f usebackq %i in (`spicetify path -s folder`) do copyfiles --flat theme/color.ini %i
